cocktailsData.strDescription: This luscious concoction brings together the tropical allure of coconut rum, the rich nuttiness of Amaretto, and the bold coffee notes of Kahlua, all harmonized by the sweet and buttery essence of butterscotch schnapps. Smoothed out by the creamy goodness of milk, the Butter Baby is a decadent treat perfect for cozy nights in or as a luxurious dessert cocktail.
cocktailsData.strInstructions: Blend together in a blender. Serve in a chilled Beer mug with Fresh Blueberries and caramel for topping.

cocktailsData.strDescription: In the glass, the Archbishop blessed the nose with an orange, caramel, and rum funk bouquet. Next, caramel and orange notes on the sip transitioned to funky rum, bitter orange, and herbal flavors on the swallow with a quinine and green herbal finish.
cocktailsData.strInstructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

cocktailsData.strDescription: The Mai Tai is a cocktail based on rum, Cura√ßao liqueur, orgeat syrup, and lime juice. It is one of the quintessential cocktails in Tiki culture.
cocktailsData.strInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish and serve with straw.

cocktailsData.strDescription: The Sidecar is a cocktail traditionally made with cognac, orange liqueur, plus lemon juice. In its ingredients, the drink is perhaps most closely related to the older Brandy Crusta, which differs both in presentation and in proportions of its components.
cocktailsData.strInstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

cocktailsData.strDescription: The Passion Fruit Martini is a tropical and fruity cocktail that is perfect for summer. It is made with vodka, sugar syrup, and passion fruit juice. It is a sweet and tangy cocktail that is perfect for sipping on a hot summer day.
cocktailsData.strInstructions: Pour all ingredients into a glass and stir. Garnish with half a passion fruit piece.

cocktailsData.strDescription: The Afternoon is a cocktail that is perfect for a hot summer day. It is made with gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup. It is a refreshing and light cocktail that is perfect for sipping on a hot summer day.
cocktailsData.strInstructions: Build into a suiting glass, with no ice. Cream on top if wanted. Served directly.

cocktailsData.strDescription: The Campari Beer is a simple and refreshing beer cocktail that is perfect for a hot summer day. It is made with Campari and lager beer. It is a light and refreshing cocktail that is perfect for sipping on a hot summer day.
cocktailsData.strInstructions: Use a 15 oz glass. Add Campari first. Fill with beer.
